name: Southwest Turkey Burgers
description: Double down on the health benefits and swap out your meat for extra lean turkey, a great way to cut down on fat intake without compromising delicious flavour!
preparation: Whisk first 5 ingredients together in a large mixing bowl.
Mix in turkey and breadcrumbs. Season with Salt and Pepper.
Cook for 10 minutes on greased grill over medium-high heat with lid closed, flipping once or until instant read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 175° F (80° C).
Serve on crusty buns with lettuce, tomatoes and a dollop of your favourite prepared Epicure Dip.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
